name: @superfluid-finance/ethereum-contracts
description: Ethereum contracts implementation for the Superfluid Protocol

scripts.test:contracts: truffle test test/contracts.test.js && cat build/eth-gas-report.txt | tee build/contracts-eth-gas-report.txt
scripts.test-coverage: npm run build && truffle run coverage --file test/contracts.test.js
scripts.proxify: truffle-flattener contracts/RToken.sol > flat.ignore.sol && sol-proxy create flat.ignore.sol
scripts.lint:js: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo '✔  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.lint:sol: solhint -w 0 contracts/*.sol contracts/*/*.sol && echo '✔  Your .sol files look good.'
scripts.pre-commit:focused-tests: grep -FR .only test || { echo '✔  No test is focused.';exit 0; } && { echo '✘ You have focused tests.'; exit 1; }
